sentences.en: After that we went to the zoo.
sentences.cn: 之后我们一起去了动物园。

sentences.en: Four rescue plans are vying to save the zoo.
sentences.cn: 4个拯救动物园的方案正争得不可开交。

sentences.en: Have we got to the zoo yet?
sentences.cn: 我们到动物园了 吗 ?

sentences.en: He couldn't take that job at the zoo because of his epilepsy.
sentences.cn: 他因患有癫痫而无法接受动物园的那份工作.

sentences.en: He then adds the usual caveat: "But, as a zoo director, I understand that it is absolutely essential that we keep them there.
sentences.cn: 接着他补充一贯的说明：“但是，作为一个动物园园长，我明白我们将它们放在那里是绝对必要的。”

sentences.en: His sister works at Beijing Zoo.
sentences.cn: 他的姐姐在北京动物园工作.

sentences.en: I agree that the demise of London zoo would be terrible.
sentences.cn: 我也认为如果伦敦动物园不复存在的话那真是太糟糕了。

sentences.en: I have a soft spot for London Zoo.
sentences.cn: 我特别喜欢伦敦动物园。

sentences.en: I like to go to zoo.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢去动物园。

sentences.en: Lionesses bearing cubs in the zoo is nothing new now.
sentences.cn: 狮子在动物园繁殖早已屡见不鲜了.

sentences.en: On Sunday I go to the zoo.
sentences.cn: 星期日的时候我去了动物园。

sentences.en: The children are mad keen to go to the zoo.
sentences.cn: 孩子们非常想去动物园.

sentences.en: The parrots in the zoo are popping all the time.
sentences.cn: 动物园里的鹦鹉一直在生小鹦鹉。

sentences.en: The road to the zoo turns off here.
sentences.cn: 通向动物园的路由这儿拐弯。

sentences.en: The zoo has a lot of rare animals in it.
sentences.cn: 这个动物园有许多珍奇的动物.

sentences.en: The zoo was budgeting for 850,000 visitors this year.
sentences.cn: 动物园在编制预算时预计今年游客会达85万。

sentences.en: There are many animals in a zoo.
sentences.cn: 动物园里有许多动物.

sentences.en: There's a zoo round here? That's dandy for my kids.
sentences.cn: 这附近有个动物园？我的孩子们一定会很高兴的。

sentences.en: They taxied to the zoo.
sentences.cn: 他们乘出租车去动物园。

sentences.en: To me the only justification for a zoo is educational.
sentences.cn: 对我来说，动物园存在的唯一正当理由是其教育作用。

sentences.en: Two gorillas have escaped from the zoo.
sentences.cn: 两只大猩猩从动物园逃走了.

sentences.en: We linked up with them at the gate of the zoo.
sentences.cn: 我们在动物园门口与他们会合.

words.tran_cn: 动物病；[动] 动物传染病

trans.tran_en: a place, usually in a city, where animals of many kinds are kept so that people can go to look at them
a place, usually in a city, where animals of many kinds are kept so that people can go to look at them
